greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse Euler transform of n^2.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} mu(k)*log(1 + x^k*(1 + x^k)/(1 - x^k)^3)/k. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 18 2019
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; n^2-b(n, n-1) end:
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i < 1, 0, Sum[Binomial[a[i] + j - 1, j]*b[n - i*j, i - 1], {j, 0, n/i}]]];
a /@ Range[40] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 06 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 25 2018
